content: Framing's 14.5% margin this quarter is likely not sustainable in the near-term, but we are clearly driving improved performance that should keep Framing margins within our target range for this fiscal year. We expect to drive continued year-over-year margin expansion, primarily in Framing Systems in Glass, where weâll benefit from last year's restructuring actions and will continue to drive operational improvements.
